thread.title: Dallas Mavericks' Dirk Nowitzki makes the perfect Lurch for Halloween

author: Madalyn Mendoza
title: Dallas Mavericks' Dirk Nowitzki makes the perfect Lurch for Halloween
text:
Image 1 of / 25 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 25 Dallas Mavericks star, Dirk Nowitzki’s Addams Family Halloween costume is going to be a hard act to follow. Dallas Mavericks star, Dirk Nowitzki’s Addams Family Halloween costume is going to be a hard act to follow. Image 2 of 25 These icons of the Alamo City are so recognizable that they would make great Halloween costumes. These icons of the Alamo City are so recognizable that they would make great Halloween costumes. Photo: MARVIN PFEIFFER, San Antonio Express-News Image 3 of 25 Mexican Elvis
What you need: Standard, flashy Elvis attire, a toy guitar and a bicycle to ride from house to house...or around Market Square. Mexican Elvis
What you need: Standard, flashy Elvis attire, a toy guitar and a bicycle to ride from house to house...or around Market Square.� ... more Image 4 of 25 Henry the Puffy Taco
What you need: A tan blanket to wrap yourself in, green tissue paper for the lettuce and a small child to tackle you at whim. Henry the Puffy Taco
What you need: A tan blanket to wrap yourself in, green tissue paper for the lettuce and a small child to tackle you at whim.� ... more Image 5 of 25 Coach Popovich
What you need: A grey wig (if needed,) a suit, clipboard, booming voice and lack of patience and time for questions. Coach Popovich
What you need: A grey wig (if needed,) a suit, clipboard, booming voice and lack of patience and time for questions.� ... more Image 6 of 25 Selena Quintanilla
What you need: Either a bustier and high waisted black pants or a purple pantsuit, red lipstick, straight black hair, a microphone or a slice of pizza. Selena Quintanilla
What you need: Either a bustier and high waisted black pants or a purple pantsuit, red lipstick, straight black hair, a microphone or a slice of pizza.� ... more Image 7 of 25 Mariachi
What you need: Black tuxedo pants or even jogging pants with the stripes, white shirt, black jacket, sombrero and a toy guitar. Take it to the next level with a little zombie makeup.
Mariachi
What you need: Black tuxedo pants or even jogging pants with the stripes, white shirt, black jacket, sombrero and a toy guitar. Take it to the next level with a little zombie makeup. Photo: Ben Olivo Image 8 of 25 Alamo Defender
What you need: A long gun, leather cross the shoulder satchel and wide brimmed hat or coonskin cap. Alamo Defender
What you need: A long gun, leather cross the shoulder satchel and wide brimmed hat or coonskin cap. Photo: AP Photo / Disney Image 9 of 25 Spurs player
What you need: Your favorite player's jersey number and a basketball. Hug the ball for the Tim Duncan effect. Spurs player
What you need: Your favorite player's jersey number and a basketball. Hug the ball for the Tim Duncan effect. Photo: Edward A. Ornelas, San Antonio Express-News Image 10 of 25 Spurs Jesus
What you need: Long white robe, belted, with sandals and a Spurs flag. Long hair or wig and a beard.
Spurs Jesus
What you need: Long white robe, belted, with sandals and a Spurs flag. Long hair or wig and a beard. Photo: San Antonio Express-News Image 11 of 25 Castro Brothers
What you need: This works best for twins, but you can get creative with a dark suit, white shirt, red tie, blue tie and a fake head for your shoulder. Castro Brothers
What you need: This works best for twins, but you can get creative with a dark suit, white shirt, red tie, blue tie and a fake head for your shoulder. Photo: James Nielsen, Chronicle Image 12 of 25 Nelson Wolff What you need: Panama Jack Safari Hat, glasses, collared shirt, leather belt, khakis or jeans.
Nelson Wolff What you need: Panama Jack Safari Hat, glasses, collared shirt, leather belt, khakis or jeans. Photo: Kin Man Hui, San Antonio Express-News Image 13 of 25 A Mi Tierra Waitress What you need: A flouncy red, white or green Mexican dress with the lace around the collar or shoulders, apron and a menu. A Mi Tierra Waitress What you need: A flouncy red, white or green Mexican dress with the lace around the collar or shoulders, apron and a menu. Photo: John Davenport, JD Image 14 of 25 Downtown Tourist What you need: Alamo rain poncho for those lovely unexpected showers, sombrero, camera and a map. Downtown Tourist What you need: Alamo rain poncho for those lovely unexpected showers, sombrero, camera and a map. Photo: Bob Owen / San Antonio Express-News Image 15 of 25 H-E-Buddy What you need: Paper sacks with groceries stuck to your head. H-E-Buddy What you need: Paper sacks with groceries stuck to your head. Photo: CUATE SANTOS Image 16 of 25 A piece of pan dulce What you need: Tan sweatsuit and felt for the stripes of icing. A piece of pan dulce What you need: Tan sweatsuit and felt for the stripes of icing. Photo: JOHN DAVENPORT, E-N Archive Image 17 of 25 A Breakfast Taco What you need: Wrap your self in foil - not like a mummy, like a taco. Don't forget the hot sauce. A Breakfast Taco What you need: Wrap your self in foil - not like a mummy, like a taco. Don't forget the hot sauce. Photo: JENNIFER WHITNEY, Special To The Express-News Image 18 of 25 Big Red and Barbacoa
What you need: For the couple costume, draw the Big Red logo on cardboard and wrap it around your torso. Use the previous breakfast taco idea and wrap your significant other in foil.
Big Red and Barbacoa
What you need: For the couple costume, draw the Big Red logo on cardboard and wrap it around your torso. Use the previous breakfast taco idea and wrap your significant other in foil. Photo: Elizabeth Zavala Image 19 of 25 Fiesta Reveler
What you need: Crazy hat or floral crown, shot glass on a string, red face paint -- because you forgot the sunscreen. Fiesta Reveler�
What you need: Crazy hat or floral crown, shot glass on a string, red face paint -- because you forgot the sunscreen. ... more Image 20 of 25 Fiesta Royalty
What you need: Thrift store wedding dress or formal gown, a tiara, sash and constantly show off your shoes. Fiesta Royalty
What you need: Thrift store wedding dress or formal gown, a tiara, sash and constantly show off your shoes. Photo: LELAND A. OUTZ, SPECIAL TO THE EXPRESS-NEWS Image 21 of 25 A Piñata What you need: Cut holes in a large piñata for your head, arms and torso. Careful, this one could get dangerous if your costume includes the stick.
A�Piñata What you need: Cut holes in a large piñata for your head, arms and torso. Careful, this one could get dangerous if your costume includes the stick. ... more Image 22 of 25 Abuelita
What you need: A gray haired wig, a Mexican dress and a chancla. Abuelita�
What you need: A gray haired wig, a Mexican dress and a chancla. ... more Image 23 of 25 Southtown Hipster
What you need: This guy rocks the hipster hat and facial hair. Add a map to the Southtown galleries, a Lone Star beer, some black-frame glasses and a scarf. Southtown Hipster
What you need: This guy rocks the hipster hat and facial hair. Add a map to the Southtown galleries, a Lone Star beer, some black-frame glasses and a scarf. Image 24 of 25 Mike Yuchnitz Too soon?
Mike Yuchnitz Too soon? Photo: Lisa Krantz, SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS-NEWS Image 25 of 25 Dallas Mavericks' Dirk Nowitzki makes the perfect Lurch for Halloween 1 / 25 Back to Gallery Dallas Mavericks star Dirk Nowitzki’s Addams Family Halloween costume is going to be a hard act to follow.
He pulled off being creepy, kooky, mysterious and spooky as Lurch in a photo posted on Twitter Sunday morning.
RELATED: This John Jay High School football Halloween costume is one of several inspired by San Antonio
He may not be as slow-moving as the TV butler, but the hardly-recognizable German completed the look with his height, of course, and a creepy facial expression that could’ve landed him a role in the iconic series. It garnered thousands of retweets and favorites in the Twittersphere.
Lurch was in the house last night.... @DannyBMFFL pic.twitter.com/8AHIiNIA3s
— Dirk Nowitzki (@swish41) October 25, 2015 The Silver and Black, known for their buzzworthy Halloween ensembles, will surely be able to put something together to beat Nowitzki on and off the court.
